amendment.description: Amendment sought to require the completion of a study on the health impacts of increased air pollution in communities surrounding the refineries that will transport diluted bitumen through the proposed Keystone XL pipeline prior to its operation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 113-88 to require a study on the health impacts of increased air pollution in communities surrounding the refineries that will transport diluted bitumen through the proposed Keystone XL pipeline.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 239 (Roll no. 171).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 239 (Roll no. 171).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Johnson (GA).
